evaluation_rubric.description: The agent must populate all sections of the brand architecture. There should be multiple, well-defined core_voice_attributes and content_pillars.
The guidelines must be clear, unambiguous, and directly usable by the Copywriter Agent. Definitions should be precise and 'Dos and Don'ts' must be explicit.
The brand architecture must be a direct and faithful translation of the strategy defined in the Layer 3 input document. Content pillars must align with the messaging pillars from the strategy.
The output must be a valid JSON object and perfectly adhere to the specified schema.
